mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT I.income_no , I.rent_no , I.amount , I.income_status , CAST(I.post_date AS DATE) AS post_date , I.deduct_amount , R.user_id FROM incometb I INNER JOIN renttb R ON I.rent_no = R.rent_no WHERE I.income_status > 0
ORDER BY I.income_no DESC )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT I.income_no , I.rent_no , I.amount , I.income_status , CAST(I.post_date AS DATE) AS post_date , I.deduct_amount , R.user_id FROM incometb I INNER JOIN renttb R ON I.rent_no = R.rent_no WHERE I.income_status > 0
ORDER BY I.income_no DESC ) B ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE incometb SET income_status = 2, post_date = SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' WHERE income_no = #{incomeNo}
